attributes.action: Get The Nit Nurses back into our Wales Schools
attributes.background: Fed up with finding nits in your child’s hair? Fed up with parents who can’t be bothered or won’t take responsibility for checking or treating their kids hair? Having a Nit Nurse in school will help keep on top of this,parents will have to listen! Good Health & Hygine is Important for our kids!!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
